website_summaries.verdict: A compact unit for beginners or DIYers looking for a portable sprayer.
pros: Powerful pump works straight out of the bucket or can
Pump only operates on-demand, cutting down on noise and wear and tear
Reversible tip makes it easy to clear blockages
cons: Parts and construction make it difficult to repair if it breaks
Some users had to replace the gun hose after a single use

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Got this for repainting the outside of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Got this for repainting the outside of my house. I ran 7 gallons of latex primer through it with a power roller adapter to backprime some replacement siding. And I sprayed 22 gallons of Behr Premium Plus Ultra exterior flat latex, unthinned. This took place over a 3 month period as I worked my way around the house doing repairs, caulking, and prep. A few times I left the sprayer filled with paint for a couple weeks instead of cleaning right away and had no problems. Spray tips and gun filter are easy to clean. Paint job turned out well, and I'm getting complements from the neighbors on a professional looking job.
customer_reviews.author: Techie Geek

customer_reviews.title: Primed perfectly, but then...
customer_reviews.text: Remember those garden hoses with the little holes along the length? Yeah, I think they accidentally attached one of those to the sprayer. I read the directions. I did everything right. It primed perfectly. I switched over to paint, and glug, glug, swooosh. Paint start leaking out along the blue hose, and like Moses crossing the Red Sea, I found myself wading through a torrent of Honied White liquid. I bought a $79.00 Wagner handheld and finished my project.
customer_reviews.author: SusS

customer_reviews.title: We added a new room and used it to prime all the drywall - I LOVED not have having to roll ceiling that was great
customer_reviews.text: I think it uses more paint than if you just rolled it on. We added a new room and used it to prime all the drywall - I LOVED not have having to roll ceiling that was great! It was pretty simple to use. Highly recommend having one person spraying and one person going along behind with a roller. The area we didn't roll out behind the sprayer ended up with a really rough texture on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Office Mom

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot of hassle and malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as a DIY product for a homeowner. However this product needs a lot of technical know how of the product and it fails quite easily without displaying any error codes or hints about the failure. It does the job when it's working but has a lot of over spray and this increases the prep work 4 fold.. So even if it's faster than roller 4 times.. The prep and cleanup take that much time as I can simply toss a roller.. Unless you are painting an empty house or exterior.. It does not make sense imo
customer_reviews.author: Prateek Garg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: excellent paint sprayer. did it myself - never had any experience using this before. there are detailed, explicit video instructions for this on youtube that you really need to watch, so you're using it accurately, and are storing it correctly. I've already used mine several times (repainted my whole place) - and will use it again. Very good quality product
customer_reviews.author: Nikibeach

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy good! Looked at the most expensive Wagner, but ended up with the least expensive Graco. Put your time into tape&drape, because this unit lays it down. Used for a 17 foot vaulted ceiling - took less than 10 minutes of spraying - covered in 1 coat no question. Very well designed! Siphon feed has a garden hose connector so you can run it clean in a few minutes - and without making a mess or wasting paint. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Necky McStifferson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. There's also YouTube videos that help explain ...
customer_reviews.text: Read the directions before you use!!! After that it's a piece of cake to paint, especially if you're doing all one color for ceiling and walls. Clean very well after each use and store wth the stuff they give you and you're golden. Great purchase. There's also YouTube videos that help explain the system, I highly suggest those.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: My first real paint sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more pleased using this product on my dining room project. Primered twice (texture in between) and painted. Learning curve went from 5 hours first use to 3 hours to less than 2 hours on the same space. Clean up takes at least 30 minutes. All three applications were set on medium-low pressure, I'm guessing about 1,800 psi. Using a five gallon pail was so much better than an attached quart size cannister found on many DIY models.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This an an excellent occasional-use paint sprayer. Sprays latex paints without splattering. It is very easy to clean up and it is very well though out. 1- gal paint can holder makes this unit very easy to pick up and move. I found its 25' hose plenty long enough for my fence project. I will (never) buy another cheap paint sprayer again. I love this unit. Its perfect for small projects like fences, sheds, but is also quite capable of a professional house re-painting or similar project. Definitely recommend. Plenty of accessories available to make painting easier...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sprayer for the price. Good directions on how to start up and clean up. Update. Finally finished painting my 1800sf home. This sprayer performed very well. 20 gallons of paint through it. I did this paint job in 4 phases do to amount of time for prep. It is vital to make sure the sprayer AND paint gun are cleaned thoroughly. The paint gun does have a filter inside the handle that will be dirty after every use. With proper maintenance I can see this paint sprayer lasting a long time for occasional use. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Wright Family

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in January 2018 from Amazon. I have only used it about four times; however, I did not like it since the beginning. The last two times that I felt like painting with this sprayer I was really disappointed. It would loose pressure while I was spraying. I had to re-prime it all over only to loose pressure in a couple of minutes later. It is a lot easier to paint with a paint roller than with this crap.
customer_reviews.author: augusto muniz

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked better than expected use paint strainers they are definitely necessary or it will clog I tried without for one 5 gallon bucket a clog quite a bit so don’t be lazy like me. Work very well fast work was able to paint and prime ceilings and walls in a 2000 square-foot home. In two days save me $10,000 in professional painter costs. Things are more expensive in my area
customer_reviews.author: Montanalivin

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in a non-functioning form. The valve that ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a non-functioning form. The valve that pushes paint into the hose had a 1/4" to 3/8" rupture in it. I was priming as prescribed in the directions, and it kept leaking water. I tightened hoses, I double checked fittings, but to no avail. I finally loosened the little plastic hose clamp and hose from the factory installed portions to reveal the ruptured piece. Cheaper to replace the whole machine than to repair the part and labor.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Cozad

customer_reviews.title: Getting familiar with it
customer_reviews.text: I felt the toughest part of using a paint sprayer would be the cleanup. I wasn’t surprised when the cleanup was a challenge not overly hard but it is messy and you need to be fully prepared. Rags, a bucket of clean water, tools to undo and remove parts for cleaning, and don’t forget latex gloves (more than one pair). Painting it self is very easy one you’ve adjusted the spray. I’m not a professional painter and frankly painting is my least favorite diy activity. I used the sprayer 3 times and each time I’m a little better. The sprayer works well and as my experience with it grows I expect I will really enjoy using it
customer_reviews.author: Brown 45

customer_reviews.title: NEVER WORKED
customer_reviews.text: This thing never would spray paint. I primed it like the instructions said over and over, paint would come out during Prime but the second I switch to spray mode nothing. I wasted 1/2 gallon of paint just trying to get it to work. I thought maybe I got a bad unit so I bought the X5 at Lowes and it worked for 10 seconds then nothing. This claims to work on all paint un-thinned but I could not even get either to spray water much less paint.
customer_reviews.author: Ted B

customer_reviews.title: Great Homeowner paint sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use- just follow the directions and this sprayer will meet almost any homeowner need. I used water-based solid stain to paint a fence and it did a great job. The reason I didn’t give it five stars is the clean up time it took to dismantle the gun and preserve the unit. It is a well built machine other than the clean up time and complexity. BUT that clean up is necessary if you want to keep it in running condition. This unit is similar to much more expensive professional models and for occasional users is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Expected a better product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Graco has a quality control issue lately. I have purchased their products over the past couple of decades. I have run about 300 gallons through this sprayer so far. This sprayer, while it serves its function, is substandard quality compared to previous Graco products. Additionally, if you have to replace the tip, it will cost you (on average) an additional 25-30 dollars. When the local HF offers a product from China for much less that is better quality, Graco should realize they have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: GnshpCSO

customer_reviews.title: This sprayer is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: After trying 2 other handheld smaller sprayers that "spit" paint on my cabinet doors, this sprayer was recommended to me by a professional who uses this sprayer in her business for painting walls, cabinet doors and furniture. I didn't really want to spend the extra $100 for this particular sprayer and another $31 for the right tip but it was well worth it for the beautiful factory finish I got on my cabinet doors! There are a few more steps to using this sprayer but if you go slow and follow the quick guide, it is simple to use. I recommended to a friend who is also painting their bathroom vanities and interior doors and they love it too.
customer_reviews.author: GoldensForever

customer_reviews.title: Wish the suction hose was longer.
customer_reviews.text: Suction hose was hard to reach the bottom of a 5 gal bucket. Unless I was to prop up the base sprayer unit but then risk having it fall over. I was able to make quick work painting the interior of a garage. Lots of over spray. But this unit performed well and met my needs. Cleaning wasn't to bad and using the Graco pump armor solution to store and protect for next time. Not sure of the longevity of this unit yet but there are mixed reviews. But after using I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hose is junk.
customer_reviews.text: First time using this, the hose that came with the machine is leaking. I turn around and there’s a bunch of paint on the floor. I thought at first it was my fault where I connected the hose to the machine, but no, it’s behind where the connector on the hose is that’s leaking. Had to go to Home Depot and spend $53 on a new hose because I have to get this project done today. Not happy and I want a $53 refund.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaR

customer_reviews.title: Best paint sprayer I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Setup was simple and easy comes with a laminated card with instructions that are easy to follow and understand. Painted the front of my house in a couple of hours and used less paint than I had anticipated using. There is some overspray but it is minimal at best. Cleanup was easy the water hose connects to the suction hose and comes with a small bottle of armor for storage after painting. This is by far the best paint sprayer I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Fiser

customer_reviews.title: Works great but I was surprised at how much paint it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but I was surprised at how much paint it takes to get it to the point that if will spray. I wonder if a 1/2 size (length) hose would not be helpful which would reduce the paint in the system by 1/2. Another possible change would be if it could be adjusted to spray slower? The current rate of spraying is great for big surfaces but is difficult to use on smaller areas. It is still a great product and i\I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome B. Compton

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value For The Money :)
customer_reviews.text: This was the first paint sprayer I've ever used. I used it to paint the section/part of the roof over hanging the edge of the house (see image). Before buying the Graco sprayer, it took me 3 hours to brush paint this upside down section (every 14 feet). I am NOT a professional painter. With the Graco sprayer, I did the 14 foot area in 7 minutes. WOW!!! :) Plus the Graco sprayer applies a smooth even when sprayings upside down!!! - thick paints like '"Sherwin Williams A-100 outdoor" Although it takes me about 1 1/2 hours to clean the sprayer when I'm done with it for the day. I
customer_reviews.author: Regan T. Powell

customer_reviews.title: not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This unit would run and then clog, run and then clog and was pain in the rear to clean - a LOT of wasted expensive paint. The tip that comes standard with this has a ton of overspray, might work well on the exterior, however not good for interior you will have a fog of unbreathable air even with a respirator on and overspray on everything. this was an expensive disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: We needed to paint entire house, ceiling, all walls, stain exterior, etc. This made the projects a breeze. There was a learning curve to getting it working initially because the tip wasn't seated properly and it took a while to figure that out but once we did this sprayer kicked butt! Would highly recommend to anyone thinking of buying. Cuts project time into fraction if we had rolled instead. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: prettyinpaint

customer_reviews.title: Painted our exterior with no issues
customer_reviews.text: We were recommended this paint sprayer. Yesterday we painted the entire exterior of our home (roughly 2300 square feet) and we had no issues at all! It was very easy to use and I'd recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Graco No Go
customer_reviews.text: This machine is nothing short of a nightmare. I spent hours trying to make it work. It clogs easily and requires cleaning every few minutes. This is what happened after one such incident. Paint everywhere. I was unfortunately unable to return, purchased months ago and just now used so way past window. It’s a lot of money and I ended up throwing it in trash and wasting an entire gallon of paint. Now I have an unfinished project and will be purchasing anything BUT Graco. Unless you want to spend more time cleaning and trying to fix this complicated machine, I recommend something simpler and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: K. Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy until they fix manufacturer defects
customer_reviews.text: My unit was defective out of the box, when it was in spray mode it seemed the motor couldn’t continuously fire - it would start and stop ever 1/2 second. Huge waste of a day trying to troubleshoot it and lots of lost paint. Unfortunately, The first time I used it was a few months after purchase and I can no longer return through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Stuhr

customer_reviews.title: Sold on Graco
customer_reviews.text: Put 35 gallons of paint thru this thing in the past week. Ceiling and wall primer on drywall. Ceiling paint, and today finish wall paint. All was latex (water base). I have no experience with high end pro sprayers. This one definitely did the job. Very impressed. Cleanup is much faster than anticipated. Probably 1/4 the time required for a Wagner power roller. All the paint was filtered thru a mesh bag. Not one malfunction, clog, or jam. Just ordered the equivalent in accessories that I paid for the sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Anon220

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and effective.
customer_reviews.text: My husband painted our entire house in just a few hours with this. He found this painter easy to use. Prepping the rooms for painting was what took long, but the painting process itself was very quick. The paint coverage in one sweep was sufficient and consistent. He tried doing another layer in one of the rooms, but discovered that it was unnecessarily excessive to do a second coat. He definitely recommends this! And I do too, because painting the house turned out to be a one-person job that also saved time as well as yield great results.
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit makes your project time shrink by 80%
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit makes your project time shrink by 80%. Easy to use and move around and wow it gets the job done fast and easy. Highly recommend. I used this on my deck with a solvent based stain. The unit comes with a spray tip for water-based paints. If your using thinner material you will need to buy a new tip at around 25-26 dollars but are available at Menards.
customer_reviews.author: Top Gun

customer_reviews.title: This makes painting possible for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I wanted to paint the exterior of my house (after getting quotes from professionals) and I had no experience at all. After reading many reviews, I decided to give it a shot. This machine is SO user friendly! It has an easy “quick start” guide that gets you going right away. There is no solution of paint needed, I was able to prime and paint the house in no time. You CAN do this and save yourself money!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Tosello

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Awsome for the price. Painted the entire body of my house in 4hrs. Clean-up was a breeze as well. I never used a sprayer in my life and managed it quite easily. The neighbors were impressed and we even caught them walking past showing their appreciation due to the fact the home hasn't been painted since 1987. 😀 Buy one and you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hilderbran

customer_reviews.title: Great for bigger jobs
customer_reviews.text: I stained 2 coats of 800+ square foot of fence in half a day including set up and clean up. If you watch the web site videos a couple times, you should have no false starts. Note the sprayer comes with a head for paint. You need a different head for stain. If you have a job using a couple of gallons or more, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Usually purchase a Wagner sprayer every year to spray deck stain during the spring because I do t like to run stain through my commercial paint sprayer then just toss it. This unit was about the same price and thought I would give it a try. It far exceeded my expectations great suction and coverage. Realize that these are cheaper units and if they last just two years then I have doubled my money. Ease of use was excellent cleanup is simple and easy. This model is a perfect price point and quality for a DIYer.
customer_reviews.author: mike smith

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A little tempermental with very thick paint but it did get the job done. But when you chose to purchase the cheapest you can find you should understand it won't be as good as units costing three times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Used to paint house. Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to paint our house. Worked well with an oil based primer and the latex based paint. Made painting a two story house a breeze. Ran into a few issues along the way, but there is plenty of trouble shooting information available and we were able to fix our problems ourselves. Definitely read the product guide thoroughly and maybe more than once before use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Molitor

customer_reviews.title: Great homeowner Paint Sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: Great paint sprayer for my small house. Primed the main interior walls and ceiling today. The machine worked flawlessly. I've never used a paint sprayer before but I did watch all the Graco info/help videos and they really helped a lot. Made using it a breeze actually. I was kinda nervous after reading some of the 1 star reviews (competitors perhaps). Cleanup was not difficult and the garden hose adapter made the process very easy when using water based paint.. For my first time ever using a paint sprayer today I'm quite pleased with Graco's product and will be spraying some paint tomorrow..
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sprayer
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is worth every penny. Building my house I needed to spray 60+ gallons of paint and this sprayer was quick and efficient. Don't think this would be the sprayer for someone painting every day, but for smaller projects or the occasional house to spray this thing is perfect. No complains, has a nice spray pattern, easy to clean, puts up product pretty quick with no thinning. Glad I purchased this sprayer as it's perfect for the DIY/handyman and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Product works amazing, I was able to paint sections of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works amazing, I was able to paint sections of my house in a day that would normally take me a couple of days with a paint roller. I also have to say, costumer support is amazing as well. A small leak developed in the hose coupler and I contacted costumer support, they sent me a replacement part and got it in 3 days. I was very impressed with how quick they responded, I couldn't be happier to own their product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for painting ouside house.
customer_reviews.text: Painted our whole outside house with this sprayer. Takes little practice for first timers. Easy to clean. Watch video online to learn how to use it. Used Behr exterior paint and worked great. Try not to overstay to prevent drips. Had little trouble using stain to paint our fence. Used a lot stain really quickly as stain is thinner. Happy with paint results! Be careful when painting if wind is blowing LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Disneygirl19

customer_reviews.title: Involved instructions
customer_reviews.text: Im sure its fine, but I returned as after reading instructions was just too difficult to deal with. Ill paint my deck by hand if it ever stops raining in NJ
customer_reviews.author: mideco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must have for any large painting project. Don’t be cheap! Buy it. Best money I ever spent. Takes a minute to get used to. Clean up can be messy until you get the hang of that too. Watch the videos! Takes longer to prep than paint with this gem. I painted a 3500sq ft home with it.
customer_reviews.author: chad wohlert

customer_reviews.title: Best DIY sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: For a DIY sprayer this one is amazing! I have never used a sprayer before and after reading reviews I decided on this sprayer. It’s easy to set up. Easy to clean and it does a beautiful job. I did my whole exterior house with ease! I am excited to also use this sprayer to do our fencing and deck. I would be a little hesitant to use in doors. You’d really have to have everything covered and masked off. There is quite a bit of over spray. Great sprayer and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AB28

customer_reviews.title: Graco does it again
customer_reviews.text: Never having used a power sprayer before I found the instructions and machine ready to use and understand. What I accomplished in 1hr with this machine saved me 4 hours of work. I cleaned the machine as per the instructions and loaded the pump with pump armor. Very impressed. The price was right too. A local rental place wanted to charge me 125$ a day to rent a similar unit.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Brown Bear

customer_reviews.title: Done to professional standard in hours.
customer_reviews.text: Had to repaint outside of house after major hail storm. Worked like a charm and done in no time. Last time painted with roller took days.... Done in hours with sprayer. Even coating and only needed 1 coat using a excellent quality paint. Happy happy ☺
customer_reviews.author: P kasserman

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the type to typically give a review, but I absolutely love this sprayer. I was able to completely repaint my entire house with it. I'm a commercial painter, so I've used other Graco and Titan sprays. For a person just looking for doing small projects around the house, the Project Painter Plus works great. It's really easy to control even if you don't have prior experience with an airless sprayer. The only negative thing I could find is that you may have to thin your paint if it's too thick. Otherwise I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Works with 1 gallon and 5 gallon pails. Hook up to garden hose to clean. Should hold up well
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.  Very reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Take the time to read the very, very quick directions. Go online and get some helpful hints. Once you do that, you will wonder why you ever hired someone else to paint your house. This was actually FUN!! Now I want to paint everything. But for now, I will stop at the outside of our house. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Emt

customer_reviews.title: First time user sprayed like a pro.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stain a new fence and it did everything I had hoped. Easy setup, relatively easy cleanup, and boy oh boy did it rip through the job. I did a 4' x 175' batten board fence (both sides) in about 3 1/2 hours). Add 30 minutes or newbie setup and another 45 for cleanup, and I was still finished in a little over a half a day.
customer_reviews.author: J Oliphant

customer_reviews.title: Brand new and first time use. Leaked during priming
customer_reviews.text: Just got it out of the box. Once I started priming it, there was a leak where the suction hose (big hose) connects to the pump. I thought the nut was loose but it was tight. I thought it was the hose connection. Not!
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product highly recommend to any diy out there. I painted the whole exterior of my house in one day with two coats using this machine. Easy to adjust spray and clean up can be little tedious but the hours and hours saved using this makes up for the 20 min clean up time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Take your time during setup
customer_reviews.text: Despite after reading the negative reviews on this sprayer, I decided to chance it and order one anyway. Just as I suspected, most of the complaints are due to user incompetence. Take your time during setup (stated clearly in the setup instructions), and you wont be disappointed. I have sprayed 75 gallons of Sherwin Williams best outdoor paint with one tip, and no clogs or problems at all. For a small machine, she is a beast!
customer_reviews.author: Big

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: good price, good instructions, good for painters, easy to sue
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Great paint sprayer but needs a swivel attachment
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sprayer and a great time saver especially for outdoor painting projects that require coverage of large surface areas (e.g. wood sided garages/barns and stockade fences, etc.). One drawback is that the paint gun doesn’t come with a swiveling attachment to the hose, which makes for a lot of wrestling with the hose to get the gun pointed where you want it. Graco sells such a swivel attachment and I have ordered it so that my next painting project isn’t such a wrestling match.
customer_reviews.author: BA_Barakas

customer_reviews.title: Nice painter.
customer_reviews.text: When you receive this painter read the instructions fully! It seems a little intimidating at first having to turn this and switch that and hook this and unhook that, but once you do it a few times its easy. I painted my entire house (1500 sq. ft.) in a day and a half easily. I pumped from a 5 gallon bucket of paint. It does use alot of paint so be aware. But soooooo much easier that a roller and brush. Its actually fun to use! Be sure to use the Pump Armour before storing.
customer_reviews.author: BIG T

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest piece of garbage. I thought man I'm buying a graco a well built sprayer. Nothing but issues. It just stops working mid spray for no reason I can see. The motor will start going super fast but nothing will come out of sprayer. I would buy the upgraded model or a different brand but my experience has be awful like beyond aweful.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good sprayer for the money
customer_reviews.text: Through 1 day of use and 10 gallons of paint it worked well. Used it with the extension wand purchases separately. Fill out the warranty card right away so you're eligible for replacements. Instructions are a bit vague so use the quick start guide. Make sure to have a bucket of water and an extra overflow bucket to prime it. Once it's primed the motor will stop running until you pull the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good for the DIYer
customer_reviews.text: Good for my DIY needs. I’ve used both oil based and water based paints in it. Very easy to use once you do it a couple times. It was about $50 cheaper on amazon than Lowe’s at my time of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I've used many Graco sprayers and this one surprised me for it's size!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest concern before using was, could keep up and have the power to spray my exterior as well as the larger ones... It stayed right up with me and the 515 tip that comes with didn't spit or clog once after 15 gallons of pretty thick satin. Very pleased to have for my home needs! Graco has always built great products and this is another. Like all the sprayers I've ever used, they will give problems if you don't take the time to clean and store well.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Can it just be me???
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! There are some many good reviews on this sprayer. I personally had a tough time getting it to spray. It kept clogging up during the project. I took all precautions and stained the paint. It just did not work for me. I believe this my first review post; had to let you all know.
customer_reviews.author: LERHONE A PHOENIX

customer_reviews.title: Complicated start, awesome results though
customer_reviews.text: I could not for the life of me get this thing to prime. I read all of the directions, all of the troubleshooting, nothing worked. Finally took it all apart and figured out the prime valve was stuck. Once I cleaned that up it primed just fine. It did an awesome job on my walls and no way I'll have to do a second coat. Clean up was very simple as well. Just make sure you have two buckets!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron E.

customer_reviews.title: Oh the time that will be saved!!
customer_reviews.text: What a time saver. We had several paint projects on the horizon and didn't want to spend the time brushing or rolling, so, we ordered the Graco. Set up is easy, using the spray gun takes a little practice so as not to spray too much paint in one spot and get runs,....gotta keep it moving and find the right pace. Clean up is the most un-enjoyable portion of this endeavour, but, with pumps, they must be properly cleaned lest they fail. Overall, this is a great product to have for the home DIY'er.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa T

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a great sprayer
customer_reviews.text: What a great investment! This is a fantastic machine, works great. I am very impressed with the quality and the spray from this painter. Did my whole house myself and saved about $1700 from the painters estimate.
customer_reviews.author: Marty J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: i have used mine several times and it works as good or better than my high performance pumps
customer_reviews.text: this is a handy tool for paint ceilings, closets, and doors. i have used mine several times and it works as good or better than my high performance pumps. i stupidly bought the warranty and cannot contact the provider. i think the sprayer is so well constructed that a warranty is a bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paint Waster
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is fine but it has alot of over spray. About 60% of the paint will be lost via over spray, and a little from the hoses. A project that called for 12 gallons of exterior paint ended up taking 20 gallons. The spray tip is useless. No uniform spray pattern, just a big cloud and your lucky what sticks. Ended with seized machine. I ended up having to hand roll to get the needed coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for DIY
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for DIY. Easy to carry. I am a female and it was the first time to use a paint sprayer. Watched tons of instruction videos on youtube. Nice customer service. Judy at customer service helped me several times at the beginning. Once you learn how to use it, it is very easy. I've saved at least $2500 and painted my rental property myself. 15" extension was very helpful to paint ceilings without using any ladder. Thanks Graco.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerInCA

customer_reviews.title: Setup following the directions was super easy. The sprayer came fully assembled
customer_reviews.text: I am a complete novice at painting and have never used a sprayer before. Setup following the directions was super easy. The sprayer came fully assembled, although the directions said to make sure connections were tight. After getting the hang of how everything worked and how to spray, I was able to spray 8 new doors and 10 closet doors. The professional painter that was painting my house was even impressed by the sprayer and my work. I'd highly recommend this sprayer. I won't be painting any houses with it, but it's definitely a great investment for DIY projects.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product!! Do not purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst Product Ever. Model was DEFECTIVE as I was informed by their customer service rep. They wouldn't replace as requested, instead recommended I drive to a service center to see if they could fix it. It was never used! Once purchased Greco takes no responsibility for their products, similar to purchasing a used toaster at a yard sale...buyer beware. This should not be allowed to occur with a never used product. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Mark Duda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome painter
customer_reviews.text: Its alittle confusing at 1st but this is a great painter..i recommend getting the extension nozzle but you gotta use the tip that comes with the sprayer..there is alot of over spray so if you have cars, windows, etc..move outta the way
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Wasted so much time.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews and doing research, I thought this sprayer would significantly speed up our painting project (of 5 rooms and a stairway). But unfortunately the sprayer we got was defective. At first it wouldn't even turn on, then my husband spent several hours trouble shooting, and the pressure gauge seemed to crap out. Now it doesn't even turn on. We wasted so much time prepping all the windows and doors, troubleshooting this thing, and cleaning it -- and we didn't even get one wall painted. Plus we wasted a whole gallon of paint. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sprayer!!
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer is nothing short of amazing. My husband and I are two novice painters and set out to paint the outside of our brick house. We debated if it was something we could tackle on our own and decided to go for it. We spent about a day and a half taping the windows, doors, etc, and then painting. The result is pretty great for two novice painters. We've received compliments from all our neighbors. Very easy to use sprayer, nice steady steam of paint, coats evenly, and easy clean up. Looking for more projects to paint!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Behm

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Purchased to paint our very large barn. It was easy to use and adjust the thickness! Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Moyer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again in a Heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: When this machine arrived, I really had my doubts. It is light and just feels like it wouldn't do the job. This machine worked flawlessly painting my house with no runs using Sherwin Williams paint A-100 8 gallons. When not in use I let the spray gun in a bucket of water for over 5 days and it worked every time. I used a 413 spray tip.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Took 2 hours with customer service and a complete disassembly of the machine to get it working. The “o nut” in the nozzle didn’t fit. Once it worked the overspray caused me to paint the floor. Followed by a brush roll over of the runny paint. I need to replace brand new door knobs and light fixtures because of the overspray. Either thin your paint or buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clogs every time I pause spraying.. Needs frequent cleaning to complete a job.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Hose doesn't suction properly and spray paint everywhere. Opened the item after the return window ended. What a complete waste of $200!
customer_reviews.author: Ryleigh's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great DIY sprayer — for large and small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Great sprayer for diy’ers! We used it on our new construction for the entire interior of our house. My husband completed the whole house in 2 days with this!! It’s kinda a pain to clean, but I don’t think we could get away with anything less unless we spent an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Holly A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: I buy of these to paint my new home and it never work. But never did get to test it before the 30 days money. So I never got any refund.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE IN HOUSE
customer_reviews.text: NOT RECOMMENDED for in home use. Wayyyy too much dust. Clogged after 5 min of continued use. Cleared clogged and repeatedly clogged. I followed precautions but still clogged and eventually just stopped working. Also cord is hard to bend and there is no flexibility, so forget about taking steps while using.
customer_reviews.author: chancellor searcy

customer_reviews.title: Great DYI paint sprayer
customer_reviews.text: You couldn’t ask for a better paint sprayer for all you DYI projects. This thing is awesome. The only small issue I had was the pump would get stuck if it sat for too long in between uses. Graco has some great videos online that got me going very quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Gun sadly leaked after use from washer
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when it was working and was pretty easy to use. The spray gun cord is stiff but manageable. Sadly gun started leaking from the washer not seating correctly after disassembling the gun to clean it. I really wanted to like it completely but washer just gave out too quick in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok then failed. I returned and bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok then failed. I returned and bought a cheaper Wagner. If I were to try another airless I'd go bigger with a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Tom.M

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned with First Use
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviewers, the sprayer malfunctioned. Paint begins to pour out from the bottom of the housing. This must be a design flaw. The malfunction area can not be seen without taking apart the housing. If you buy the Magnum model and use it indoors be advised to have some form of capture/protection under the unit. The malfunctioned happened outside and still made a large mess. Not to mention to gallon of wasted paint. Grayco must be aware of this problem. btw - The quick start directions show a push button primer. The unit I received did not have this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Donald G

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I painted my shop using this sprayer. Two coats of primer, 2 coats of exterior paint. Clean-up between coats was a chore, but I can't imaging painting a large area without it. Exactly what I needed and met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lower cost than renting one, and performed just as well.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking at renting a sprayer to paint my sons brick house. This was not only cheaper, but this sprayer performed as well as any I’ve ever rented. Now he has a sprayer for future projects!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brewer

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: very good equipment. did not have a bit of trouble using for the first time and I've never used an airless sprayer, works great
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and pretty easy learning curve!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time paint sprayer I find this super easy to use. It does use up a ton of pant but I think most sprayers would do that. Set up is pretty easy and cleanup is as easy as I imagine anything with paint could be. Seems to work great! I re did my front door and cabinets and they look so much better than brush painting
customer_reviews.author: HouseofSanada

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a godsend for property owners
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible. Having never had an airless sprayer before it is night and day. The product seems well built and we used it to do two houses and a ton of fencing this summer. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete Waste of Time and Money
customer_reviews.text: Completely optimistic in my purchase, and was extrememly disappointed after such a bad result. I perfectly followed the instructions line by line. Not only did the paint not spray correctly, we lost lots of paint from the gun as well. We actually ended up mixing in three times the directed amount of Floetrol because we thought that maybe the paint was too thick.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow step by step directions. Life saver! Made painting the house so much easier! The only way to paint!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great small sprayer
customer_reviews.text: POTUS because my other paint sprayer is too large to drag around for smaller projects. This free is great for painting doors cabinets fences trim. Hardly any overspray easy to clean lightweight all in all it's a great little sprayer
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Works well and a real time saver but time consuming to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have done a number of projects with this machine. Staining a fence which worked great. Painted ceiling and walls with the Graco roller. Worked well. Painted kitchen furniture did not work as well. A lot of waste.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great paint sprayer.
customer_reviews.text: First time using a sprayer and I loved it. Sprayed my basement ceiling with dryfall paint and it worked awesome. Next project is stain for playset.
customer_reviews.author: j card

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: you need someone to read instructions to you while you properly clean the machine
customer_reviews.author: billyjharris

customer_reviews.title: Great for one spray job
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional painter who bought this sprayer as a handy sprayer for choice jobs. I used the sprayer 2 times, spraying maybe 15 gallons total. The third time, the pump just stopped working. We tirelessly cleaned the machine and added the pump armor as directed after each use. Don't waste your money nor time on this machine....
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wood

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for finishing trim in our new home. Was able to easily assemble and operate. Definitely worth the money and saved me soooo much time with doors and trim painting!
customer_reviews.author: Moon1987

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Did our whole house in a day and worked really well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a Great Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Perfect price for a great product. Works very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pump to paint my 1700 square foot house. Great product for the price. I am not a painter by trade and everything was easy to set up. The water hose attachment was a great idea for clean up of the water base paint I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

product_meta.title: Graco Magnum 257025 Project Painter Plus Paint Sprayer
product_meta.description:
Style:Project Painter Plus Paint SprayerThe DIY Series are perfect entry-level sprayers for tackling home projects such as doors, trim, furniture, interior walls, ceilings, decks and fences. Ideal for those painting up to 50 gallons per year. The Magnum Project Painter Plus delivers amazing results with speed and finesse, allowing you to finish your project in half the time it would take using brushes and rollers. The high-speed performance of this sprayer puts you in the driver's seat with fully-adjustable pressure. Give your projects the reach they need, since this lightweight sprayer can support up to 50 ft. of paint hose. You can spray directly from a 1 or 5 gal. bucket with its flexible suction tube and clean up in no time with the PowerFlush adapter.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Graco - The Brand Preferred by Pros. Whether you’re a weekend warrior, a serious DIY enthusiast, a handyman or remodeling contractor, or a painting professional, Graco makes the ideal airless spraying equipment to meet your needs. Whether you are just starting out or moving up, choose the Magnum or Graco model to help you handle your job with ease. No matter what you're painting—entire homes, rooms, decks or fences—Graco has you covered!
feature_bullets: CONTROL PAINT FLOW: Fully adjustable pressure to give you ultimate control of paint flow for any project size; RAC IV Switch Tip allows you to reverse the tip when clogged to keep you spraying
SPRAY PAINT UNTHINNED: Stainless Steel Piston Pump allows you to spray paint unthinned at high pressure. Compatible Tip Size (inch)- 0.009, 0.011, 0.013, 0.015
SPRAY DIRECTLY FROM PAINT BUCKET: Flexible suction tube allows you to spray directly from a 1 or 5 gallon paint bucket
RECOMMENDED USE: Annual use recommendation is up to 50 gallons per year
EASY TO STORE: Extra storage compartments provide space to store the spray gun, extra spray tips, and power cord
FAST AND EASY CLEAN-UP: PowerFlush Adapter connects to a garden hose for fast and easy cleaning
IDEAL FOR HARD TO REACH AREAS: Can support up to 50 ft. of paint hose to reach peaks or second stories without diminishing performance
VOLTAGE: 110 volts; ETL Certified, ETL File #3174859MIN-001

specifications.Included Components: SG2 Metal Spray Gun, RAC IV 515 SwitchTip, 25 ft. Duraflex Paint Hose, Pump Armor Storage Fluid, PowerFlush Adapter, Quick Start-Up Guide and Operation Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,114 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
